Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

entry.title: Grimvalor
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫149,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Slash your way through the hordes of darkness and defeat King Valor's fearsome guardians in this breathtaking adventure! "Chaining together a slick series of attacks, dodges, and jumps, is incredibly satisfying." ‚Äî PocketGamer "I suspect mobile gaming fans will be playing and replaying this one for years to come." ‚Äî TouchArcade, 5/5 A malicious power stirs in the forgotten kingdom of Vallaris. Tasked with discovering the fate of its lost king, your quest quickly takes a sinister turn and you are cast into darkness. Surrounded and outnumbered, you must grab your sword, steel your temper and fight your way through a land that does not welcome you. Except for the friendly merchant - he's grateful for your business. ABOUT THE GAME Grimvalor is a challenging hack & slash platformer with fast-paced combat in a dark fantasy world. Take control of a lone warrior on a quest to restore a corrupted realm. Embark on a journey through atmospheric landscapes and dungeons in a massive story-driven premium experience. COMBAT & EXPLORATION Master skill-based combat, learn enemy patterns and bring them down with all your fury. Explore the shattered lands of Vallaris, find and upgrade equipment and level up your character. Face the legacy of King Valor's madness and prevail! FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Epic boss fights ‚Ä¢ Stunning 3D visuals accelerated by Metal graphics ‚Ä¢ Accurate and customizable touch controls ‚Ä¢ Full support for MFi game controllers ‚Ä¢ Use iCloud to keep your saves in sync between devices. ‚Ä¢ Play offline - perfect for commute. ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫3.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2.999,99 [‚Ç∫2.999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫3.999,99]Ôºâ

  • Annual TipÔºö‚Ç∫239,99
  • Monthly TipÔºö‚Ç∫35,99

  • Large TipÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • Medium TipÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Small TipÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Little TipÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Strongbox Pro is available here for outright and upfront purchase instead of via an In-App Purchase upgrade. This version of Strongbox is identical to the much loved Strongbox application with all the Pro features and the same regular update schedule. Strongbox is an application for keeping all your passwords safely stored and protected by one master password. Supporting the open source Password Safe and KeePass formats. *** Supports Family Sharing *** *** Features *** - Face ID/Touch ID Unlock for the ultimate in convenience, security and speed. - PIN Code Unlock with a Duress PIN option for those tricky situations. - Passkey support - The latest, most convenient and most secure authentication method (passkeys). - YubiKey protection - secure your databases with a hardware token. - Secure - protected by time tested military grade cryptography. - Private - Isolated In-App attachments viewer for your sensitive documents, photos & videos. - Audit your passwords - Automatically check your database for weak passwords including a 'Have I Been Pwned?' check. - Cloud Support, so you can access your cloud safes using iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive, WebDAV or SFTP even when offline. Use the built in Files app for many other storage options or store them securely only on your local device. You choose your storage. - Search your entire set of passwords and secrets instantly and powerfully, with deep search. Autocomplete new entries, and auto generate secure passwords. - Compatible - Import/Export by Files app, Email, CSV, iTunes File Sharing or use cloud storage. - Standards compliant - using the time tested Password Safe and KeePass formats so you can import any existing password safe you have. - Features galore - Incredibly configurable password generation including Diceware (XKCD) & regular passwords. - Timed Auto Clear Clipboard. - Entry History. - KeePass Field References, Tags, Custom Icon & FavIcons (including automatic search & download). - Two Factor Authentication codes (TOTP) - QR Code, Steam & Manual. --------------------------------------------------------------------- ‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase ‚Ä¢ Strongbox Privacy Policy may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/privacy-policy/ ‚Ä¢ Strongbox Terms of Use may be found here: https://strongboxsafe.com/terms/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • RCS Pro (1 month)Ôºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • RCS Pro (1 year)Ôºö‚Ç∫1.799,99
  • RCS Pro (6 months)Ôºö‚Ç∫1.299,99

Application Description

RCS: Real Combat Simulator ‚Äì Rule the Skies! The Ultimate Military Flight Combat Experience on Mobile Take control in the most advanced military flight simulator: pilot legendary fighter jets, engage in epic dogfights, master air-to-air and air-to-ground combat, and prove your skill as an elite combat pilot. Fly and Fight Anywhere in the World! -Master takeoffs, landings, and full combat missions -Pilot state-of-the-art jets with realistic avionics and detailed cockpits -Access thousands of global airports and military airbases -Train with interactive tutorials and sharpen your combat skills Realistic Fighter Jets: Fly faithfully recreated aircraft with dynamic cockpits, authentic flight physics, and full weapons systems -A-10C Thunderbolt II ‚Äì The armored close-air-support powerhouse, featuring the GAU-8 Avenger cannon and precision strike capability. -F/A-18 Super Hornet ‚Äì A versatile carrier-based multirole jet with advanced avionics and a wide weapons loadout, perfect for dogfighting and precision strikes. -M-346FA Master ‚Äì A modern, agile fighter-trainer equipped with digital displays and advanced sensors. -F-16C Fighting Falcon ‚Äì The iconic multirole fighter, prized for its speed, agility, and versatility. Equipped with advanced radar, fly-by-wire controls, and a wide array of precision air-to-air and air-to-ground weapons. More aircraft coming soon! Immersive Combat Features: -Global battle zones with real-world weather and time-of-day effects -Advanced radar and targeting systems for air and ground threats -Full arsenal of missiles, bombs, cannons, and countermeasures -High-speed maneuvers and satellite-based terrain Mission Editor & Multiplayer: -Create custom missions: set objectives, control weather, and define enemy AI -Build your own lobbies, design scenarios, and fly missions together in real-time multiplayer -Choose Your Battlefield ‚Äì Select from realistic global locations and military airbases. -Share your creations and relive your best battles with advanced replay tools Personalize Your Experience: -Customize your jet with authentic liveries and camo patterns -Capture cinematic dogfights with advanced in-game cameras -Share your combat highlights with the RCS community An internet connection is required for full simulation and multiplayer features. Some features may require a subscription. Download now the ultimate military flight simulator! Fly modern fighter jets, join intense air combat missions, and dominate the skies in RCS: Real Combat Simulator. TERMS OF USE: https://www.rortos.com/terms-of-use/ Support: rcs@rortos.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: iStat Menus 7
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫599,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫299,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly Weather SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫199,99
  • Monthly Weather SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

The ultimate system monitor, seamlessly integrated into your menubar. iStat Menus covers a huge range of stats, including CPU, GPU, memory, network usage, disk usage, time, battery, weather and more. iStat Menus 7 is a full reboot, sporting an all-new design with hundreds of big and small improvements. iStat Menus is unmatched in efficiency, and is the most CPU-friendly system monitoring app. ‚Ä¢ CPU and GPU ‚Ä¢ Highly detailed CPU info, with current usage for individual cores, history graphs, load averages, uptime, CPU frequency, and a list of the apps using the most CPU. Efficiency and performance cores can be styled differently. Plus, GPU processor, memory, temperature, and frequency on supported Macs. ‚Ä¢ Weather ‚Ä¢ Requires a paid weather subscription ‚Ä¢ Quickly glance at current conditions in your menu bar, or dive into an incredibly detailed hourly forecast and weekly weather overview, covering low and high temperature, wind speed and direction, chance of rain, humidity, dew point, UV index, pressure, visibility and more. ‚Ä¢ Memory ‚Ä¢ Extensive memory stats covering usage, history, memory pressure, compressed memory, swap, and a list of the apps using the most memory. ‚Ä¢ Rules ‚Ä¢ iStat Menus can notify you of an incredibly wide range of events, based on CPU, GPU, memory, disks, network, sensors, battery, power and weather. This lets you be notified when your public IP has changed, if your internet connection is down, if CPU usage is above 60% for more than 10 seconds, if disk space is low, or a near-infinite range of other options. ‚Ä¢ Disk usage and activity ‚Ä¢ See used space, free space, and disk activity in your menu bar. S.M.A.R.T. status monitoring, per app disk usage, and more detail for all your disks is only a click away. ‚Ä¢ Network ‚Ä¢ Keep on top of what‚Äôs being sent and received for all network connections with history graphs, current bandwidth usage, and a bandwidth breakdown for the top apps, as well as detailed connection info, bandwidth graphs, public and private IP addresses, and an internet connectivity indicator. ‚Ä¢ Battery and power ‚Ä¢ Detailed info on your battery‚Äôs current state and a highly configurable menu item that can change if you‚Äôre draining, charging, or completely charged. Plus, battery levels for Bluetooth devices. ‚Ä¢ Sensors ‚Ä¢ A realtime listing of the sensors in your Mac, including temperatures, hard drive temperatures (where supported), fans, CPU frequency, GPU frequency (where supported), voltages, current and power. Fan speeds can be controlled, and even switched or gradually ramped based on temperatures and battery state. ‚Ä¢ Date and time ‚Ä¢ Highly customisable menu bar clocks, a calendar with upcoming events, and world clocks with detailed sun and moon info. Each world clock can have a custom name, to make it easier to see the time for coworkers or family members. ‚Ä¢ Combined ‚Ä¢ Combined mode combines multiple iStat Menus items into a single menu bar item. You can choose what‚Äôs shown in the menu bar and what‚Äôs shown in the menu, allowing you to save space in the menu bar while still having access to all the information. It‚Äôs super handy on laptops. Privacy policy: https://bjango.com/privacy/ Terms of use: https://bjango.com/help/istatmenus7/licenseagreement/

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Whisper Notes - Offline Speech to Text Record voice or import audio/video files, get accurate transcripts‚Äî100% offline, on-device. No recording limits, no subscriptions, no cloud uploads. Just $4.99, once. ‚ñ† Core Features - 100% offline transcription‚Äîyour audio never leaves your device - Record voice memos, meetings, lectures‚Äîunlimited length - Import audio/video files (MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV)‚Äîtranscribe offline - Extract subtitles from videos in your Camera Roll‚Äîno upload needed - 100+ languages supported, auto-detected - Export with timestamps (SRT, VTT, TXT) - Batch process multiple files ‚ñ† Privacy & Speed Your recordings stay on your iPhone/Mac, always. No internet needed, no cloud uploads, ever. Transcription speed: On iPhone 15, 5 minutes of audio takes about 1 minute. Older devices are slower but work fine. ‚ñ† Pricing $4.99 one-time. Most similar apps charge $100+/year in subscriptions. No recurring fees, no in-app purchases, no ads. Pay once, use forever. Not satisfied? Tap Settings ‚Üí Request Refund. ‚ñ† Common Questions Does it work completely offline? Yes. Your audio never leaves your device. Works on flights, in remote areas, anywhere. Is there a recording time limit? No limit. Record for hours if you want. Longer recordings just take more time to transcribe on your device. Does it support real-time transcription while recording? Not during recording, but yes during transcription‚Äîafter you finish recording, you'll see the transcript appear in real-time as it's being generated. Where is my data stored? Only on your device. We have zero access. Note: If you delete the app, your recordings are deleted too (because we don't keep secret backups). Please export important files regularly. Why no AI summaries? Privacy. We never upload your recordings to any AI service. Want summaries? Copy the transcript and use your preferred AI tool. We don't lock your data into a proprietary AI system. Why does transcription stop when I switch apps? iOS limits background GPU usage for third-party apps. Just return to the app and tap "Re-transcribe"‚Äîit will restart. Can I import existing audio/video files? Yes. Import MP3, M4A, WAV, MP4, MOV files and transcribe them offline. Great for extracting subtitles from videos without uploading to cloud services. entry.title: Things 3
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.749,99 [‚Ç∫1.299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫2.499,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.749,99

Application Description

Get things done! The award-winning Things app helps you plan your day, manage your projects, and make real progress toward your goals. Best of all, it‚Äôs easy to use. Within the hour, you‚Äôll have everything off your mind and neatly organized‚Äîfrom routine tasks to your biggest life goals‚Äîand you can start focusing on what matters today. ‚ÄúThings offers the best combination of design and functionality of any app we tested, with nearly all the features of other power user applications and a delightful interface that never gets in the way of your work.‚Äù ‚ÄîWirecutter, The New York Times KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Your To-Dos Your basic building block is the almighty To-Do‚Äîeach a small step toward a great accomplishment. You can add notes, tag it, schedule it, and break it down into smaller steps. ‚Ä¢ Your Projects Create a Project for any big goal, then add the to-dos to reach it. Use headings to structure your list as you outline your plan. There‚Äôs also a place to jot down your notes, and a deadline to keep you on schedule. ‚Ä¢ Your Areas Create an Area for each sphere of your life, such as Work, Family, Finance, and so on. This keeps everything neatly organized, and helps you see the big picture as you set your plans in motion. ‚Ä¢ Your Plan Everything on your schedule is neatly laid out in the Today and Upcoming lists, which show your to-dos and calendar events. Each morning, see what you planned for Today and decide what you want to do. The rest is down to you :) MORE THINGS TO LOVE As you dive deeper, you‚Äôll find Things packed with helpful features. Here are just a few: ‚Ä¢ Reminders ‚Äî set a time and Things will remind you. ‚Ä¢ Repeaters ‚Äî automatically repeat to-dos on a schedule you set. ‚Ä¢ This Evening ‚Äî¬†a special place for your evening plans. ‚Ä¢ Calendar integration ‚Äî see your events and to-dos together. ‚Ä¢ Tags ‚Äî categorize your to-dos and quickly filter lists. ‚Ä¢ Quick Entry ‚Äî¬†create to-dos from anywhere, as soon as the thought hits you. ‚Ä¢ Quick Find ‚Äî instantly locate to-dos, headings, or tags. ‚Ä¢ Type Travel ‚Äî¬†jump from list to list with your keyboard; just start typing! ‚Ä¢ Widgets ‚Äî see your lists on the desktop or in Notification Center. ‚Ä¢ Mail to Things ‚Äî forward an email to Things; now it‚Äôs a to-do. ‚Ä¢ Markdown ‚Äî¬†structure & style your notes. ‚Ä¢ And much more! MADE FOR MAC Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to. You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders‚ÄîThings can do it all! There‚Äôs even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows. STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It‚Äôs great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it! AWARD-WINNING DESIGN Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.‚Äù ‚ÄîApple GET THINGS TODAY Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Install the app today and see what you can do! Visit our website now and get a free 15-day trial for your Mac: www.things.app If you have any questions, please get in touch. We provide professional support and will be glad to help you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: BimmerLink for BMW and MINI
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99 [‚Ç∫1.499,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.999,99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99

In-App Purchases

  • CarPlay Add-OnÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

BimmerLink is the direct link to your BMW or MINI. Using one of the supported OBD adapters, you can read trouble codes or display sensor values in realtime, check the current state of the DPF in your car or register a new battery after replacement. BimmerLink even allows you to remotely control the exhaust flap or mute the Active Sound Design in your car. READ AND CLEAR TROUBLE CODES Diagnose your car as would otherwise be possible only by your Service Partner. In contrast to generic OBD apps that read emission related errors only, BimmerLink allows you to read and clear trouble codes from ALL control units in your car. DISPLAY REALTIME SENSOR VALUES BimmerLink provides a big selection of values like oil temperature or boost pressure. Keep an eye on all the important parameters of your car with a personalized dashboard. EXHAUST FLAP REMOTE CONTROL* Take control over the exhaust flap in your car and decide yourself, whether it should be closed or open. ACTIVE SOUND DESIGN** If you do not like the artificial engine sound generated in your car, just mute the Active Sound Design with BimmerLink. SOUND TUNING*** The ‚ÄúSound Tuning‚Äù option allows you to disable the ‚Äúexhaust burble‚Äú in cars equipped with the S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4). DPF REGENERATION**** BimmerLink allows you to check the current state of the diesel particulate filter in your car. Find out when the last regeneration took place or how much ash has accumulated in the filter and start a regeneration with the touch of a button. CARPLAY ADD-ON***** Enhance your driving experience with the CarPlay add-on for BimmerLink. Access your sensor values on your car's display for improved vehicle monitoring, all integrated seamlessly with CarPlay for ease of use. BATTERY REGISTRATION If you want to replace the battery in your car, this has to be registered in the engine control unit and BimmerLink allows you to do this yourself now. PARKING BRAKE SERVICE MODE BimmerLink allows you to activate the service mode for the electromechanical parking brake. SERVICE RESET Reset the service display in your car after carrying out maintenance work like a brake pad replacement or an engine oil change. RESET SHORT CIRCUIT LOCKS Unlock lamp outputs that were disabled due to a short circuit. TRANSMISSION ADAPTATION VALUES Check the adaptation values of the ZF 8HP automatic transmission in your vehicle. REQUIRED ACCESSORIES To use the app, one of the supported Bluetooth or WiFi OBD adapters or cables is required. For more information please visit https://bimmerlink.app. SUPPORTED CARS - 1 Series (2004+) - 2 Series, M2 (2013+) - 2 Series Active Tourer (2014+) - 2 Series Gran Tourer (2015+) - 3 Series, M3 (2005+) - 4 Series, M4 (2013+) - 5 Series, M5 (2003+) - 6 Series, M6 (2003+) - 7 Series (2008+) - 8 Series (2018+) - X1 (2009+) - X2 (2018+) - X3, X3 M (2010+) - X4, X4 M (2014+) - X5, X5 M (2006+) - X6, X6 M (2008+) - X7 (2019+) - Z4 (2009+) - i3 (2013+) - i4 (2021+) - i7 (2022+) - i8 (2013+) - iX (2021+) - iX1 (2022+) - iX3 (2021+) - MINI (2006+) - Toyota Supra (2019+) * Only for cars that are equipped with an exhaust flap by factory. ** Only for cars that are equipped with the ‚ÄúActive Sound Design‚Äú by factory. *** Only for cars with S55 engine (M2 Competition, M3, M4). **** Only for cars with a diesel engine. ***** Additional in-app purchase required.

Application Description

Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese. Global Domination: Conquer energy markets worldwide on maps such as USA, Germany, France, Benelux, Eastern Europe, South Africa, Italy and the Middle East. Each map brings unique gameplay that will put your strategic skills to the test. Tutorial & Help: Whether you're an experienced Power Grid player or a beginner, the game features a detailed tutorial that walks you through the basics step-by-step. And if you have any questions while playing, context-sensitive help is available to make sure you're always on the right track. Achievements: Challenge yourself by unlocking a variety of achievements. These achievements range from strategic feats to special challenges. Recharged Version: The app includes the Recharged version with Against the Trust and MAGA variants that make the gameplay even more diverse and challenging. Exciting Gameplay: Challenge AI opponents or play against friends in real-time or turn-based. Online Domination: The Power Grid app allows you to compete against friends or rivals from around the world. The app gives you the opportunity to compete with players from all over the world. Choose your path: a variety of maps and map variants are available to customize and refine your strategy. Adapt to the specifics of each and outsmart your opponents to get to the top of the power industry. The Power Grid app has been carefully designed to seamlessly bring the charm of the board game to your smartphone or tablet. The intuitive interface ensures a smooth gaming experience for both experienced players and novices. Don't miss out on the electrifying fun and challenges offered by the Power Grid app! Download the app now and embark on a journey to conquer the power market one move at a time. Whether you're playing alone and looking for a challenge or you're a player looking to engage in epic duels with friends, the Power Grid app offers all that and more.

Application Description

Requirements of The Last Warlord: To ensure the game's normal operation, it is required that iOS version should be higher than iOS Version 16 and use iPhone X or X Plus, iPhone 12 or above, or iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 or any iPad Pro to run the game. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/threekingdomsthelastwarlord Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/577230/discussions/1/ Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord is a turn-based lord-playing strategy game developed by the Chengdu Longyou Studio. The studio created this game world set in the period of the Three Kingdoms mainly based on people's opinions on other games set in that period. The game is very detailed in depicting the differences between various cities and also the abilities and features of the military officers. The game also applies an appealing battle system in which weather, landforms, and many other factors will influence the result of each battle. The game is based on the famous Chinese historical novel by Luo Guanzhong (about A.D. 1330 - 1400). I. Simple and graceful graphics finished by fine-lined drawing The portrait of every character in the game is finished by fine-lined drawing with the same style as the picture-story books "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". All interfaces of the game are designed in a typical Chinese style. II. The governing modes are easy to get started with: There are easy governing modes in the game so that players can manage various affairs easily and spend more time enjoying its other facets. Due to the game's lord-playing mode, players do not need to pay much attention to cities besides their own capital. Instead, they can order prefects to govern other cities and later on give them commands when necessary. III. A rich variety of gameplay and contents Over 1,300 officers are available in the game (including those recorded in historical books and novels). There are up to 30 attributes for officers. Over 300 features of officers are available. Over 500 kinds of verified precious items have been applied to the game world for players of different preferences to choose from. Over 60 cities of different styles and 200 features of cities are available. There are also abundant techs research and development items. Its system of combat units contains three main kinds of combat units and about 20 kinds of special combat units. Ultra abundant official positions. Numerous simulated natural phenomena, incidents and disasters will highly represent the calamitous period of the Three Kingdoms. Travelling around will trigger various incidents. IV. The turn-based battle mode requires careful planning in deploying troops Weather, landforms, and even the height of the battlefield will influence any battles in the game. There's also a siege mechanism with a great gaming environment. There are various siege vehicles for players to storm castles and also defending their own castles. V. Other functions There are also other functions available in the game. Cloud Save Steam Cards The achievement system allows players to collect and show off achievements.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫499,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

WHAT IS ScanGo? ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap. It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. HOW TO SCAN DOCS? - Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera. - Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages. - Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans. - Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What‚Äôs more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness. HOW TO MANAGE DOCS? - The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster. - Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs. - Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable. - Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access. - Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array. - Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly. - Save scans as JPEG to Photos. - Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages. - Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer. - Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed. AFRAID OF DATA LOSS? ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app. HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically. EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement. SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size. SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode. MORE QUESTIONS? If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we‚Äôll help to figure it out asap.

MADE FOR MAC Things is tailored to the Mac with deep system integrations as well. A great example is Quick Entry with Autofill: a shortcut that grabs content from other apps and adds it to Things for you, such as a link to a website or an email you want to get back to. You can also enjoy a beautiful dark mode at sunset, connect your calendars, open multiple windows, add a variety of widgets, import from Reminders‚ÄîThings can do it all! There‚Äôs even Shortcuts integration if you want to automate your workflows. STAY PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO Things also has full-featured apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Apple Vision Pro (sold separately). All your devices sync seamlessly via our free Things Cloud service. It‚Äôs great to have everything at your fingertips when you need it! AWARD-WINNING DESIGN Made in Stuttgart, with two Apple Design Awards to its name, Things is a fine example of German engineering: designed not only to look fantastic, but to be perfectly functional as well. Every detail is thoughtfully considered, then polished to perfection. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.‚Äù ‚ÄîApple GET THINGS TODAY Whatever it is you want to accomplish in life, Things can help you get there. Application Description

Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It‚Äôs a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac ‚Äî everything stays perfectly in sync. Task Management ‚Ä¢ Create and manage tasks ‚Ä¢ Add notes and due dates to tasks ‚Ä¢ Organize tasks with tags and filters ‚Ä¢ Paste task lists from other apps Timer Control ‚Ä¢ Start, pause, or skip intervals ‚Ä¢ Auto-start the next interval (optionally) ‚Ä¢ Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy ‚Ä¢ Manage completed intervals Timer Customization ‚Ä¢ Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks ‚Ä¢ Define number of intervals before a long break ‚Ä¢ Set a daily goal for completed intervals ‚Ä¢ Assign different timer settings to individual tasks Reports ‚Ä¢ View detailed reports to monitor your progress ‚Ä¢ Export your data in CSV format Sounds and Notifications ‚Ä¢ Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency ‚Ä¢ Variety of alarm sounds ‚Ä¢ Interactive notifications ‚Ä¢ Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer Integration ‚Ä¢ Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) * ‚Ä¢ Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle ** ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow Quick Access ‚Ä¢ Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen ‚Ä¢ Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island ‚Ä¢ Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button Automation ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app) ‚Ä¢ Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app Device Support ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Also available for Mac ‚Ä¢ Dark and Light mode support * Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately. ** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

entry.title: MiniGames Watch Games 24-in-1
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads! It's like your own personal games arcade on the go. This collection of 24 games includes: ‚ñ† PONG Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. ‚ñ† BRICK BREAK A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points. ‚ñ† INVADERS Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points. ‚ñ† 2048 Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048. ‚ñ† TUBE TWIST Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. ‚ñ† BUBBLE Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them. ‚ñ† MISSILE How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. ‚ñ† HOP Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way. ‚ñ† Drift Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points. ‚ñ† Cong It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play. ‚ñ† Tower Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points. ‚ñ† FLAP Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings. ‚ñ† FROG ROAD Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game. ‚ñ† BLOCK RUN Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners. ‚ñ† MATCHTRIS A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points. ‚ñ† DRONE Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship. ‚ñ† THRUST Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird. ‚ñ† SUPER JUMP We‚Äôve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. ‚ñ† RETRO RACER Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock. Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer. ‚ñ† CONTRA PANG A mashup of Contra‚Äôs shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang. ‚ñ† CIRCLE INVADERS A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups. ‚ñ† MOON SNAKE We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. ‚ñ† DUAL BREAK What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control. ‚ñ† CIRCLE BREAK It‚Äôs like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage. Features: ‚Ä¢ No ads! ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Screen shake ‚Ä¢ Vibrations ‚Ä¢ Sound Effects ‚Ä¢ Music ‚Ä¢ Leaderboards
